  2. The Wait is Over: Taobao's First-Ever English Interface Launches in Singapore, Unlocking Endless Shopping Possibilities  Yahoo Finance
  3. Malaysia Becomes First Country To Get Taobao In English  Lowyat.NET
  4. Singapore shoppers can now shop on Taobao’s app with English interface  The Independent
  5. Taobao Launches Beta English Interface To Enhance Shopping Experience For All Malaysians  BERNAMA
